resources.string: My github is kevinyan215. My Student Id is 008493875. Enjoy.

string-array.name: fortunes
string-array.item: You will have an excellent day.
Avoid walking on cracks. Don\'t break your back.
Win a game. Get some fame.
Say Hello to a stranger. Fend off danger.
Go to the gym and you\'ll get buff.
Check out the SU. It\'s cool.
Drink lots of water. It\'s good for you.
